description:
To determine if this EMF shielding fabric works, first I used my intuition. ⁣
⁣
I put the sweater on for the first time last night, the fabric feels cool and silky. I immediately felt a physical sigh of relief as soon as I put it on, I even slept in it all night - I never sleep in a sweater but I wanted to! ⁣
When I woke up I didn't want to take it off, so I wore it all day and all night. ⁣⁣
My friends noticed the sweater looked so comfortable and both commented on it. They also commented that my energy was really high. I had also noticed an increase in energy today. ⁣
⁣
Finally, we tested the phones to see if the fabric actually blocks the cell signal AND IT DOES!!! ⁣⁣
⁣
We tried multiple experiments with multiple phones and like magic the cell signal was immediately lost when we put it inside the sweater. ⁣⁣
⁣
I imagine my organs - my heart are protected from EMF's when I am wearing this sweater and I can feel it!! ⁣
⁣⁣
I relaunched my website www.shamanminerals.com so that I can sell these sweaters and also EMF blocking underwear for Men (to protect their balls from the sterilizing effects of radiation). ⁣⁣
The fabric is a mix of silver, cotton and nylon. This is the silver era! Silver is our ally in the battle against weaponized frequencies. ⁣
⁣
We are thinking about making baby blankets with the fabric, so if you have an interest in ordering one let me know so we can see if there is a demand! ⁣
⁣
If you want to support me you can purchase with the link in my bio! ⁣⁣
Love, Kaleigh 🙌✨☀😎👊💛
